documents.document: No but seriously how's $1 million bet guy doing now? #SuperBowl
Performances & tweets re: @melissamccarthy & @ladygaga = pretty entertaining. #SNLSpicer #SuperBowl #girlpower
Sorry neighbours. #sorrynotsorry #Superbowlhalftime
YES #Superbowlhalftime #MillionReasons

No @SavvyAuntie #sleepover weekend is complete without a trip to @MastermindToys! Done.
I missed the segment last night but all caught up now. Hell yeah - @melissamccarthy for press secretary. #SNLSpicer
Not a fan of tattoos but this https://t.co/Zodsd7IGjc
"Organized religion has a lot to answer for." #Unholy
Just saw @dianeflacks & @baharehyaraghi in #Unholy & I have so many thoughts. But mostly, Oh. My. God. An incredible, must-see.
Sometimes I'm sure I'm the girl version of #SheldonCooper. Without the science genius. Must be why, as a non-TV fan, I love @bigbangtheory.
This aired last night https://t.co/YTotEoC4Mq & #SickKidsVS Broken Hearts out tonight: https://t.co/7UydYHeBAr. Love it when the stars align
Now if only we could fix your egg & get you a profile pic @lcskf.
TFW your fave ntl news anchor says u gave them exclusive, rare, inside access & u made it happen. Whatta team, me & u @lcskf! #girlcrush
We're grateful to Xavier's parents and to you & your crew. #HeartMonth https://t.co/jzQ6XmaMow
Although once unheard of, partnerships like these are the way to go for the NFP sector to continue to thrive. https://t.co/5F7hgFYodx
Amazing @ParamountFoods. Love it when successful entrepreneurs are also philanthropists! Family. Community. https://t.co/5e9H1z3Onn
Today was day 3 of 3 shoots. This story to come soon (ish)! #heartsurgery #3Dprinting https://t.co/quQMW5FQaN
If only one could donate one's passport to someone in need. I will not be using my US one for the remainder of its validity. ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ #MuslimBan
Having day where lack of open comms among colleagues is making my head pop off. When u work in Comms u think it's plain & simple. But no.
@rdelaet Glad to hear you enjoyed the talk & your family had a positive experience here. We're biased, of course, but it's a special place.
Well! Looks like you guys lit up #ldnont a little wee bit tonight, @LoriDavison6 @carlosthethird & @therealmcmiker. Nicely done.
Yeah! That's right! Not to mention covg in 17 countries... : ) https://t.co/fsd6x4bNK1
Terrific initiative by @MLSEFoundation https://t.co/adXmsUmdEE
Dinner @fatpasha was DELISH! Thank you for the great service. Me & @anfarnell will be back.
Had the privilege of spending most of today in Dr. GVA's OR ... and just wow. https://t.co/2PBzy1QVfD
Up and at it dark and early again today. Always a little surprised by how many people are out here already.
It's an early start today. Something cool is brewing! Chase. Pitch. Land. Shoot. Today is day 1 of 3 shoots. #lovemyjob #butnotmornings
In 20+ yrs I don't know if I've gone to gym on Friday. But I'm irritated & raging & I had to release that energy somewhere. #Inauguration
This headline https://t.co/hdXYSpCpY9
And for today's gift to @sickkids fr @VancityReynolds...a boost for city's Ego Meter in @torontolife! Oh, &â€¦ https://t.co/YB08HShGgm
@mojorising Yes. I need the t-shirt.
Slow talkers. I can't even. Give me your headlines, people. In a lot of meetings lately with people who deliberate over every word.
Shout out to @StJude for scoring a mention in @Hasbro #TrivialPursuit 2000s edition. That is very cool.
Got new PC at work & waiting 4 new iPhone. But highlight of work day? Seeing this in PR brief: Need guests to feel serious amt of #FOMO. Ha.
Just finished reading all the guidelines 4 #IABCOvation & #CPRSAce award entries. Lots of writing work ahead. Will be worth it. #SickKidsVS
Of all I have done in my life, I am most proud to be your dad. -- #POTUS
God how I wish this was the beginning and not the end. #PresidentialFarewell #ObamaFarewell #POTUS
Loved the profile story on you, @docdanielle in today's @TorontoStar Insight (no link yet). Also enjoy you on @CBCTheNational health panel.
Inspiring is an overused word. But this story about what @jimestill is doing for humanity really is just that. https://t.co/eQ4TxZSj9r
I just bought a CD. Like a real music CD. (I also read a hard copy #newspaper this am, like I do everyday.) #olskool
Thanks @TheSocialCTV for re-airing our favourite show of the year! #SickKidsVS https://t.co/7UvSuqimyp
I've spent time this wk @multipastaa & it's incredibly touching how people miss dad, hearing how they loved & enjoyed him. It filled me up.
What part of our brains allows us to sing old Italian love songs we haven't heard in years? 'Cause can it be used for sthing else?
Good morning. It's the last day of this terribly awful, no good year. Let's do this.
Forget your and you're, its and it's. It's New Year's Eve, people. #apostrophe #nye2016
I made an early morning hair appointment on a day off because...? #morningpeople Sigh.
Some best days off = catching up w/ old friends, being a lady who lunches & walking around town w/ my tunes. Just don't call me a lady.
You'll remember our patient, Kael. @CBCToronto profiles his physiotherapist Ryan: "Kael taught me more about myselfâ€¦ https://t.co/ZvhzFazECr
I have wanted to see @Mirvish #ComeFromAway SO badly. No idea why I procrastinated getting tickets. Now they're sold out. Boo.
Charlie is 'right where she should be' says mom, thx to complex heart surgeries. More in @SaultStarâ€¦ https://t.co/x17IkNUhb8
8 yo nephew: Are you coming on our trip? Me: No. You're going on a family vacation. Him: You're part of our family! Come! Me: ðŸ’•ðŸ’“ Melting.

Do you have sthing that changes the sheets? 'Cause I hate changing the sheets. https://t.co/VbuNa4qv0n
Thank you @alessiacara @Duracell for a wonderful visit today & for your generosity! You're welcome to visit @sickkids anytime.
Check it out @Canuckscribe #Brampton https://t.co/tXvPvE7WBE

Good morning. It's another celebrity day at SickKids. Gosh this is a great place to work in PR. #tistheseason
I work at SickKids = I get the #flushot. You should too. https://t.co/ojiedvlcEE
@i_am_gemma_ We're going to miss having you on our PR team. Thank you 4 your hard, excellent work during an exceptionally exciting quarter!

Ryan Reynolds - the gift that keeps on giving https://t.co/pXXs5D2kf9
Thanks for the explanation. I got a nice (tho slushy) morning walk up from Union out of the delay. https://t.co/IWo3x6oUXg
I'm impressed Go train just left the station on time on this first messy Monday morning. Just wish they'd dim lights like early am flights.
Seriously. I don't think this guy can be any sweeter: https://t.co/LaFQLNtbKn #CriticsChoice #EntertaineroftheYear Tribute to @macgra23 too.
New fave song alert: The Greatest by @Sia feat @kendricklamar https://t.co/wjTrmRaYhB For the dance beat, lyrics not so much. On repeat.
Our giant milk & cookies 4 Santa are still on the helipad; they're just covered in #snow https://t.co/fHDYGoi3z0 #SickKidsVS #onstorm #dlws

Umm no thanks, Facebook. I am not interested in the year-in-review video you made for me.

Also. Apparently I'm OK w/ buying 98 items 4 niece & nephew w/o looking at prices. But I'll take 2 buses & 2 subways home to avoid Uber $.
It's not #christmasshopping unless your feet hurt, you're sweaty hot, so tired already people can you walk faster, and omg so hungry.
Love this by @nkeung https://t.co/KW4n0D7A9K. Hits close to home & reminds me of @multipastaa. Mom & pop shops = quality, community, love.
